__e: She doesn't have the perspective to understand that, because she's still a kid.
Sometimes we need to back off so that we're not in each other's business so much, you know?
Maybe you're just too close to the situation to have a healthy perspective.
I mean, I think any time there's a new technology everyone says, "okay, we have to stand back and think about what this is really gonna mean to society."
And once I took a look back... and I finally understood how everything happened... I decided that no one would ever hurt me again.
But you know, they say hindsight's 20/20, and I see things more clearly now, and I've given this a lot of thought.
